title: How many songs does Black Pink have? - Quora

response.answer_text: Blackpink is notorious for underfeeding their fans. They only have 13 songs and they’ve been around for 3 years. All blinks ever do is ask for a comeback, and they never get anything in return. It’s really frustrating to me. Blackpink could’ve been huge, if only YG knew how to manage. Literally all Kpop managers are trash, and overwork their idols, but YG is one of the worst Theres probably an article on Dispatch about the dating scandal between YG and gambling. He’s also such an unbearable manager that Jennie posted a video of herself twerking when the news that he was going to jail came out. Jennie (and probably all the other Blackpink members) hate YG. He’s terrible at protecting members and combatting rumors during scandals. A while ago dispatch revealed that Jennie and Kai were dating.  These were the photos they released, of Jennie getting in a car with Kai. We all know how crazy fangirls, fanboys, and antis can be, so obviously Jennie (and Kai too, but to a lesser extent because of course male idols are never treated as terribly as female idols) started getting hate. And you know what Blackpink’s company had to say??  That’s right, they said he was her uber driver.  So yeah, YG is one of the worst (if not the worst) managers in Kpop. I’m not even a blink, and I know about how terrible he is. I know you asked a really simple question but it set me off on an anti-YG tangent. Terrible management has made it so Blackpink has less songs than most rookie groups. The most recent “comeback” I’ve seen is BP’s tiktok ad for Samsung.  If you want to know any girl groups that actually have comebacks, I would recommend Loona, Mamamoo, or Twice. Thanks for reading :) -fellow Kpop junkie

I will only Count Original Songs: 2016 August - Boombayah and Whistle (Square One) 2016 October - Playing with Fire, Stay and Whistle Acoustic Version (Square Two) 2017 Jun - As If it’s Your Last 2017 August - Boomayah, Whistle, Playing with Fire, Stay, As If it’s Your Last and Whistle Acoustic Version (All Tracks are Japanese versions of their Korean Songs) (EP: Blackpink) 2018 Jun - DDU-DU-DDU-DU, Forever Young, Really, See U Later (EP: Square Up) 2018 Dec - The whole Square Up in Japanese and then the other 5 previous ones 2019 Apr - Kill This Love, Don’t Know What to Do, Kick It, Hope Not, DDU-DU-DDU-DU Remix (EP: Kill This Love) 13 Original Songs, 9 Japanese Versions of their Songs, 1 Aucostic Song, 1 Japanese Version Aucostic Song, 1 Remix. Total: 25 songs but 13 original ones But Still 13 songs. 3 years and 13 songs.  They should have added 13 songs on this thing but whatever. MVs: 7 (Boombayah, Whistle, Stay, Playing with Fire, As If it’s Your Last, DDU-DU-DDU-DU and Kill This Love) Dance Practices: 8 (Boombayah, Whistle, Playing with Fire, As If it’s Your Last, DDU-DU-DDU-DU, Forever Young, Kill This Love and Don’t Know What to do)
